demo_insights_override.description: Payload used to force the AI to return specific medical scenarios for the demo.

payload.truth: Your historical tracking reveals that carbohydrate intake exceeding 200g directly correlates with elevated fasting glucose, while sodium levels above 2000mg are actively exacerbating your Stage 1 Hypertension.
tips: You only hit 160 grams of carbs out of your 185-gram target, so you'll need more energy tomorrow.
You missed your water goal by half a literâ€”make sure to hydrate!
To help manage your logged hypertension today, consider taking a short evening walk.

demo_history_overrides.description: The streak and Nutridex history are hardcoded to perfectly simulate a 21 day period.
